title: Unique Watch Faces
summary: Turn your modern wearable into an epic timepiece  with our premium watch faces.
description: “The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique -Walt Disney”To makes you more unique move on with the unique watch faceWhat you get:★	BLACK OWL has been designed for those business men and professionals who love to work through the night★	Pamper yourself with the features of  Unique Watch Face★	Shows you Phone and watch battery Status★	Displays a Date and DayWhat is Unique?★	Fills the gap between a conventional watch and a hi-tech android wearable★	Displays Battery status, Date, Month ★	A watch face for every mood and occasion★	Watch face designs inspired from various classic modelsJust a Click:   To know more about Unique Watch Face visit - http://insideglobe.com/unique-watch-faces/Share Your Idea:   If you wish to suggest us your idea of any additional widgets, Please contact us at (wearables@insideglobe.com)Note: The watch Faces is not for all the smart watches but only android wear watches paired with android phone(4.3+)Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :• Motorola 360 (1st , 2nd gen and sport)• Huawei Watch• ASUS Zen Watch 2• LG G Watch• LG G Watch R• TAG Heuer Connected• Fossil Q Founder• LG Watch Urbane• Sony Smart Watch 3• Samsung Gear Live
descriptionHTML:
“The more you like yourself, the less you are like anyone else, which makes you unique -Walt Disney”
To makes you more unique move on with the unique watch face

What you get:
★ BLACK OWL has been designed for those business men and professionals who love to work through the night
★ Pamper yourself with the features of Unique Watch Face
★ Shows you Phone and watch battery Status
★ Displays a Date and Day

What is Unique?
★ Fills the gap between a conventional watch and a hi-tech android wearable
★ Displays Battery status, Date, Month
★ A watch face for every mood and occasion
★ Watch face designs inspired from various classic models

Just a Click:
To know more about Unique Watch Face visit - http://insideglobe.com/unique-watch-faces/

Share Your Idea:
If you wish to suggest us your idea of any additional widgets, Please contact us at (wearables@insideglobe.com)

Note: The watch Faces is not for all the smart watches but only android wear watches paired with android phone(4.3+)

Requires Android Wear - supports the following watches :
• Motorola 360 (1st , 2nd gen and sport)
• Huawei Watch
• ASUS Zen Watch 2
• LG G Watch
• LG G Watch R
• TAG Heuer Connected
• Fossil Q Founder
• LG Watch Urbane
• Sony Smart Watch 3
• Samsung Gear Live
comments: Clean and nice designs Like the selection also like the sweeping second hand. Would be nice to be able to change the watch hands and mix and match the backgrounds. Other than that...like I said nice selection.
Buyer Beware Not for all Android watches. I wish they would list a definitive list of the android watches they support. Buyer beware.

FINALLY.. Latest update works with other watches! It took SEVERAL months for this to finally work with all the Android wear watches, but it does now, and it's nice. Few options to tweak, nice and clean look.
Not sure about this.. Looks a lot better on the pictures than on the watch unfortunately.
